content: अनुपलब्धिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} Non-recognition, non-perception (प्रत्यक्षाद्यभाव); नास्ति घटोऽनुपलब्धेः the knowledge of घटाभाव is possible because the प्रतियोगी or counter-entity is not found with the non-entity or अभाव (that is, there being no उपलब्धि or knowledge of the घट); one of the instruments of knowledge according to the Mīmāṃsakas, but not according to the Naiyāyikas.
